entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Resource not found in .NET 9 when xaml-comp is false #22536
  • MauiIcon Color has no effect #22534
  • NTLM does not always work properly on all platforms with MAUI with SocketsHttpHandler #22533
  • [Android & iOS]: In ListView with IsPullToRefreshEnabled enabled the PullToRefresh activity indicator remains stuck and doesnt get closed in .net 8 MAUI #22532
  • MAUI Toolkit DrawingView works fine in Debug mode but crashes in Release mode (Android) #22531
  • Custom view as FlyoutIcon in Shell #22530
  • Lottie animations (SKLottieView) do not render inside CollectionView.EmptyView on both iOS and Android #22529
  • [iOS] Label with specified LineHeight gets cut from top #22528
  • An error occurred trying to accept Android SDK licenses. #22527
  • [Testing] Remove IgnoreIfPlatforms usage on UITests #22525
    Backlog
  • Android.Views.InflateException when trying to migrate a SearchBar custom renderer #22522
  • ImageButton Padding resizes image down unexpectedly even when there is available space #22521
    Backlog
  • ImageButton border (BorderWidth) overlaps the image instead of adding space #22520
  • Microsoft.Maui.ApplicationModel.NotImplementedInReferenceAssemblyException #22519
  • Frame + Shadow ignores TapGestureRecognizer #22518
  • ImageButton Aspect is incorrect on Windows #22517
  • [MAC OS] SNMP Socket Permission Issues #22516
  • Newly installed VS 2022 In combination with Microsoft.Maui.Controls and Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compativility leads to The type or namespace name 'MauiWinUIApplication' does not exist in the namespace 'Microsoft.Maui' #22515
  • Consider rounding numbers in `TransformationExtensions` #22513

Closed

  • RadioButton: TextColor for plain Content not working on iOS #18011
    Backlog
  • MAUI App bundle size is too large on release mode (second attempt) #19469
  • [Android] Optimize the package by removing the unnecessary runtimes when publishing #14646
  • DisposeAsync() on IJSObjectReference causes hanging when called on Android 11 and lower on app suspension #13529
    9.0-rc1
  • Maui usage of Glide is preventing us from using our own model loaders #22465
  • [IOS] Maui .NET 8 (VS 2022 17.9.6) The app has been terminated when start debugging #22330
  • [XamlC] Improve code generated for x:Array #20745
    .NET 9 Planning
  • FlexLayout trigger Cycle GUI exception #9075
    Backlog
  • [iOS/Mac Catalyst] ApplicationTitle is not setting correctly #15717
  • MacCatalyst container temporary file will disappear #22512
  • [MacCatalyst] Poor scroll performance in MAUI ListView #12388
  • App did not automatically reflect changes to the label #22331
  • [Android] Deleting an item from the CollectionView takes a long time #22190

PullRequests

Created

  • [Testing] Remove IgnoreIfPlatforms usage on UITests #22526
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [Trimming] Remove feature switch which is not necessary anymore #22524
    area-xaml

Merged

  • Add switch to BlazorWebView to configure 'fire and forget' for Android Disposal #22496
    area-blazor
  • [XC] Fix LogWarningOrError #22454
  • [X] rename XFC to XC #22488
    area-xaml, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net9.0] Make "IsConnected" public #22500
    community ✨, area-controls-general
  • [Controls] Enforce CA1507 - use nameof() where possible #22102
    area-architecture, community ✨
  • [X] generate less IL for x:Array #21615
    area-xaml

Updated

  • Memory Leak in Style with Trigger - fix #22503
    area-xaml, community ✨
  • Fixes KeyboardAutoManagerScroll when using scrollable Editor #21932
    community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [Win] Double tap behavior #20870
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-gestures
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • [iOS] Fix WordWrap not working when Padding is set on Label #16136
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label, Under Consideration
  • Replace MessagingCenter in AlertManager #12910
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, platform/tizen, stale, area-controls-dialog, Under Consideration
  • [Housekeeping] Added UI Test to validate project template #18567
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • Fix <ApplicationTitle> encoding in maui-mobile template #22084
    area-templates, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale
  • [WinUI] Optimize `TransformationExtensions` #22481
    area-animation, community ✨
  • Stop Android from pinning native references to system services #22281
    platform/android 🤖, area-essentials, community ✨, Backlog
  • [X] do not apply Bindings if DataType doesnt match #22056
    area-xaml
  • App Crash during Scroll Animation while navigating away from Page - fix #22492
    area-animation, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix flyout behaviour switching exception #22453
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • [iOS] Read only Editor is editable when Next from on screen keyboard #22501
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor
  • Tab Selected Icon Color not changing if using Font icons - fix #22437
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Added a support for the device's theme change #22508
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [android] fix one layer of "overdraw" by default #22126
    platform/android 🤖, legacy-area-perf, t/perf
  • [iOS] Not display InputAccessoryView closing the Software keyboard #22394
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor
  • Fixes BindableLayout BindingContext inheritance #17290
    legacy-area-perf, community ✨, memory-leak 💦, t/perf
  • Picker Attribute "SelectedIndex" Not being respected on page load - fix #22353
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Fix Android ImageButton background, ripple and padding #22298
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-button
  • Minor optimization for `MergedStyle.SetStyle` #21540
    area-xaml, community ✨
  • Just trigger SizeChanged when Window size changes #22413
    community ✨, area-controls-window
  • CollectionView Items display issue when Header is resized on iOS - Fix #21812
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Implement touch interception for layouts on Android #13725
    area-layout, platform/android 🤖, .NET 8 + Servicing
